course_title: Advanced Grant Writing for Clinical and Translational Research - Part A
course_description: This 2-semester hands-on grant writing course is designed for junior faculty in the health sciences who currently have a career development award and are planning their first NIH R01 grant (or similar).
schedule_location: Th 3pm-4:50pm in Grace Crum Rollins P41
sections: Class Nbr: 3868, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 3-4:50p, Instructor: Gross/Michopoulos, Status: Open
